name: Human Osteology VR
summary: Learning Human Osteology is an important step for anyone with career aspirations in the medical field. We have designed a virtual-reality course that brings the best parts from a standard Osteology course right to you. For this course, we have 3-D scanned real human bones with a high-quality 3-D scanner, so all of the minute details of every bone are there. You will be virtually holding real human bones in your hands, turning them over, inspecting them up close, trying to figure out how best to learn...
